answer:
ImmunizeBC only answers questions about immunization. You can contact HealthLinkBC anytime by calling 8-1-1 and ask to speak to a nurse. You can also contact your local health unit to ask what services they provide. Find a health unit here.
Immunization Nurse
question: Will the public health nurses give a B12 shot?
